long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Image-Rotater

A lightweight, elegant tool for seamless image rotation with precision control.

## Overview
Image-Rotater is a streamlined web utility designed to help users manipulate image orientation with ease. Built with modern web technologies and featuring a sleek, glassmorphic dark-mode interface, this tool offers quick and precise image rotation capabilities without compromising on performance or user experience.

## Key Features
- **Precise Rotation Controls**: Rotate images at exact 90°, 180°, and 270° angles
- **One-Click Reset**: Instantly revert to original orientation
- **Dark Mode Interface**: Eye-friendly design with modern glassmorphic UI
- **Responsive Design**: Seamless functionality across all device sizes
- **Zero Configuration**: Start rotating images immediately with no setup required
- **Lightweight Performance**: Minimal resource usage for swift operation

## Technical Specifications
- Pure HTML/CSS implementation
- No external dependencies required
- Cross-browser compatible
- Mobile-responsive interface
- Modern glassmorphic UI elements
- Optimized for dark mode environments

## Use Cases
- Quick image orientation fixes
- Batch processing preparation
- Social media content preparation
- Document scanning optimization
- Photo album organization
- Web content management

## Benefits
- **Time-Saving**: Accomplish image rotation tasks in seconds
- **User-Friendly**: Intuitive interface requires no learning curve
- **Eye Comfort**: Dark mode design reduces eye strain during extended use
- **Professional Results**: Precise rotation angles ensure perfect alignment
- **Universal Access**: Works across all modern web browsers
- **Resource Efficient**: Minimal system requirements

## Getting Started
1. Load your image
2. Select desired rotation angle (90°, 180°, or 270°)
3. Click to apply rotation
4. Use Reset button to return to original orientation if needed

## Browser Support
- Chrome (Latest)
- Firefox (Latest)
- Safari (Latest)
- Edge (Latest)
- Opera (Latest)
